title: Monochrome
newbarktown_mom_talk1_1:
Hope you have a good day,
sweetheart.
newbarktown_mom_event1_good_2:
I'd offer you breakfast,
but I have something
important to tell you!
newbarktown_mom_event1_bad_1:
Aww, that's sad to hear.
Bad dreams?
newbarktown_mom_event1_bad_2:
Well, I have some news
that'll make you feel a lot
better!
newbarktown_mom_event1_4:
Isn't that exciting!
You'll get your own
partner and everything!
newbarktown_mom_event1_5:
Oh, I remember when I
challenged the league
myself.
newbarktown_mom_event1_6:
But that was a lifetime
ago and I never managed
to finish it,
newbarktown_mom_event1_8:
That was before the
Regional Government
changed the rules.
newbarktown_mom_event1_9:
Not much we can do
about that, though.
newbarktown_mom_event1_10:
But enough of your old
mother's ramblings.
newbarktown_mom_event1_11:
You should get going,
don't want to be late.
newbarktown_elm_1_1:
Good luck out there
Not like you'll need it.
newbarktown_elm_event1_2:
I'll keep things short and
sweet since I'm sure you
want to get going.
newbarktown_elm_event1_3:
Today begins your journey
as a pokemon trainer.
newbarktown_elm_event1_14:
Along this journey you'll
battle many kinds of
people and meet many
pokemon...
newbarktown_elm_event1_5:
Sorry, I'm no Professor
Oak, no one can really
replace him.
newbarktown_elm_event1_6:
I haven't really done this
before. The league is so
picky with who they
choose in Johto these days.
newbarktown_elm_event1_7:
Not to mention they only
really seem to choose
people who seem like
they're going to fail...
newbarktown_elm_event1_8:
Here we have three pokemon,
and it is up to you to
choose which one will be
your partner.
newbarktown_elm_event1_9:
starter_grass, the Grass-type.
they've got high defenses
and health, but fall a
little short on offense.
newbarktown_elm_event1_10:
starter_fire, the Fire-type.
A real glass cannon, this
one. High special attack
and speed, but no bulk.
newbarktown_elm_event1_12:
starter_water, the Water-type.
They have strong physical
abilities and defenses
but is lacking in speed.
newbarktown_elm_event2_1:
Now, i'm not supposed to
give you any help aside
from encouraging 
Good luck out there!
newbarktown_elm_event2_8:
But i want you to do well,
so here...
newbarktown_elm_event2_3:
Good luck, kid. I do hope
you make us proud.
newbarktown_elm_event2_6:
???: What? You trying to
be a hero, kid?
newbarktown_elm_event2_7:
I'll show you not to
play hero.
newbarktown_elm_event2lose_2: Now get out of my sight before you get the same as that weak little trash.
newbarktown_lab_assistant1_1_1:
Hey kid,
do you need something?
newbarktown_lab_assistant1_1_3:
The professor?
He's in his office just
past the bookshelves.
newbarktown_lab_assistant2_1_3:
I'm totally working,
what are you...
newbarktown_lab_assistant2_1_4:
I'm so tired...
Please don't tell the
professor about this.
trainer_battle_lose_1: All of your pokemon have fainted.
trainer_battle_lose_2:
You run home to heal
your wounded pokemon.
tackle_desc: The user throws their body into the enemy.
scratch_desc: The user swipes in front of themselves with sharp claws.
growl_desc: The user lets out a intimidating growl that lowers the enemies Attack.
leer_desc: The user glares menacingly lowering the enemies Defense.
leafage_desc: The user sends out a gust of leaves, dealing damage to enemies hit and leaving a pile of leaves that deals damage when stepped on.
ember_desc: The user spits a hot flame that deals damage and can burn.
watergun_desc: The user lets out a gush of water dealing damage with high knockback.
